name: generate
description: Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

options.name: schematic
options.description: The schematic or collection:schematic to generate.

appShell.name: appShell
appShell.description: Generates an app shell for running a server-side version of an app.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: clientProject
options.description: The name of the related client app.

options.name: route
options.description: Route path used to produce the app shell.

options.name: name
options.description: The HTML selector of the Universal app

options.name: appId
options.description: The app ID to use in withServerTransition().

options.name: outDir
options.description: The output directory for build results.

options.name: root
options.description: The root directory of the app.

options.name: index
options.description: The name of the index file

options.name: universalProject
options.description: The name of related Universal app.

options.name: test
options.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

options.name: tsconfigFileName
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: testTsconfigFileName
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

options.name: appDir
options.description: The name of the application directory.

options.name: rootModuleFileName
options.description: The name of the root module file

options.name: rootModuleClassName
options.description: The name of the root module class.

options.name: sourceDir
options.description: The path of the source directory.

application.name: application
application.description: Generates a new basic app definition in the "projects" subfolder of the workspace.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: projectRoot
options.description: The root directory of the new app.

options.name: enableIvy
options.description: EXPERIMENTAL: True to create a new app that uses the Ivy rendering engine.

options.name: inlineStyle
options.description: When true, includes styles inline in the root component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. Default is false, meaning that an external styles file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

options.name: inlineTemplate
options.description: When true, includes template inline in the root component.ts file. Default is false, meaning that an external template file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

options.name: viewEncapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new app.

options.name: routing
options.description: When true, creates a routing NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new app.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the app.

options.name: skipPackageJson
options.description: When true, does not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

options.name: minimal
options.description: When true, creates a bare-bones project without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

options.name: skipInstall
options.description: Skip installing dependency packages.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the application.

class.name: class
class.description: Creates a new generic class definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new class.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the class, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new class.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the class.

component.name: component
component.description: Creates a new generic component definition in the given or default project.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the component.

options.name: inlineStyle
options.description: When true, includes styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

options.name: inlineTemplate
options.description: When true, includes template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

options.name: viewEncapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new component.

options.name: changeDetection
options.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix to apply to the generated component selector.

options.name: styleext
options.description: The file extension to use for style files.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new component.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: skipImport
options.description: When true, does not import this component into the owning NgModule.

options.name: selector
options.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: export
options.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this component.

options.name: entryComponent
options.description: When true, the new component is the entry component of the declaring NgModule.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the component.

directive.name: directive
directive.description: Creates a new generic directive definition in the given or default project.

options.name: skipImport
options.description: When true, does not import this directive into the owning NgModule.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new directive.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new directive.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the directive, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: selector
options.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: export
options.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this directive.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the directive.

enum.name: enum
enum.description: Generates a new, generic enum definition for the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the enum.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the enum definition, relative to the current workspace.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project in which to create the enum. Default is the configured default project for the workspace.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the enum.

guard.name: guard
guard.description: Generates a new, generic route guard definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new route guard.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new guard.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new guard.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the guard, relative to the current workspace.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the guard.

options.name: implements
options.description: Specifies which interfaces to implement.

interface.name: interface
interface.description: Creates a new generic interface definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the interface.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the interface, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the interface.

options.name: type
options.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

library.name: library
library.description: Creates a new generic library project in the current workspace.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the library.

options.name: entryFile
options.description: The path at which to create the library's public API file, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: prefix
options.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

options.name: skipPackageJson
options.description: When true, does not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

options.name: skipInstall
options.description: When true, does not install dependency packages.

options.name: skipTsConfig
options.description: When true, does not update "tsconfig.json" to add a path mapping for the new library. The path mapping is needed to use the library in an app, but can be disabled here to simplify development.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the library.

module.name: module
module.description: Creates a new generic NgModule definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the NgModule.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: routing
options.description: When true, creates a routing module.

options.name: routingScope
options.description: The scope for the new routing module.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project root.

options.name: commonModule
options.description: When true, the new NgModule imports "CommonModule".

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the module.

pipe.name: pipe
pipe.description: Creates a new generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the pipe.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the pipe, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new pipe.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

options.name: skipImport
options.description: When true, does not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

options.name: module
options.description: The declaring NgModule.

options.name: export
options.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the pipe.

service.name: service
service.description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the service.

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: flat
options.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

options.name: spec
options.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new service.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

options.name: lintFix
options.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the pipe.

serviceWorker.name: serviceWorker
serviceWorker.description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to create a service worker

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: target
options.description: The target to apply service worker to.

options.name: configuration
options.description: The configuration to apply service worker to.

universal.name: universal
universal.description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to set up server-side rendering for an app.

options.name: clientProject
options.description: The name of the related client app. Required in place of "project".

options.name: appId
options.description: The app identifier to use for transition.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: test
options.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

options.name: tsconfigFileName
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: testTsconfigFileName
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

options.name: appDir
options.description: The name of the application folder.

options.name: rootModuleFileName
options.description: The name of the root NgModule file.

options.name: rootModuleClassName
options.description: The name of the root NgModule class.

options.name: skipInstall
options.description: When true, does not install packages for dependencies.

webWorker.name: webWorker
webWorker.description: Pass this schematic to the "run" command to create a Web Worker

options.name: path
options.description: The path at which to create the worker file, relative to the current workspace.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project.

options.name: target
options.description: The target to apply service worker to.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the worker.

options.name: snippet
options.description: Add a worker creation snippet in a sibling file of the same name.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: dryRun
options.description: When true, runs through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: force
options.description: When true, forces overwriting of existing files.

options.name: interactive
options.description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

options.name: defaults
options.description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.
